about_the_game:
Dream Strikers: A Thrilling 3D Action Fighting Game

Dream Strikers is a 3D action fighting game that combines high-level strategy with exhilarating combat. Players take on the role of Nightmare Hunters, engaging in intense battles against a variety of powerful foes. Featuring seamless camera movement, dynamic scene interactions, and dazzling combat effects, the game delivers a revolutionary battle experience.

◆ Cutting-Edge Visual Effects for an Immersive Battle Experience

With stunning visual performance, Dream Strikers excels in everything from dynamic character expressions and battle lighting effects to intricate environmental details in every scene. Using advanced image processing techniques, the game provides an unprecedented sense of presence, making every fight a visual spectacle.

◆ Flexible Combat System and Freestyle Combo Mastery

The unique combat system allows players to freely combine attack skills based on the situation, creating their own fighting style. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned player, you can quickly grasp the controls and discover endless possibilities in combat. Each character boasts distinctive skills and fighting styles, giving you unparalleled freedom to dominate the battlefield.

◆ Diverse and Unique Characters in a World of Passionate Fighting

Dream Strikers features a roster of characters with unique styles, each accompanied by a rich backstory and combat mechanics. No matter which character you choose, you'll dive into a world brimming with challenges and emotions. As the story unfolds, players will uncover the truths hidden in the darkness and face life-or-death battles against enemies from within nightmares.

name: Dream Strikers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K/AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti/AMD Radeon R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset

short_description: "DreamStrikers" is an easy-to-pick-up 3D action fighting game featuring a fast-paced combat system and stunning, exaggerated visual effects, allowing players to fully immerse themselves in a high-sensory battle experience.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
